name: amoscicki-plugins
description: Personal Claude Code plugins by Arkadiusz Moscicki

plugins.name: docs-researcher
plugins.description: Subagent that researches documentation and creates project-knowledge-base skill in .claude/skills/. Supports progressive disclosure for large docs.

plugins.name: swarm-orchestrator
plugins.description: Multi-agent parallel task orchestration with wave-based execution, automatic auditing, and model escalation
